name: Sync Slack channels to Linear
description: Manually syncs Slack channel information to Linear as issues. The workflow retrieves all active Slack channels, gathers detailed information about each channel (name, purpose, member count, creation date), and creates corresponding Linear issues with low priority. This is useful for documenting channel structure, onboarding, or creating a reference of team communication channels. Execute this workflow manually by triggering the 'manual/sync-slack-channels-to-linear' event.

config.note: Execute this workflow manually by sending an event: { name: 'manual/sync-slack-channels-to-linear', data: { tenantId: 'default' } }

steps.name: Get Slack Channels
steps.code: await tenant.slack.api.channels.list({ exclude_archived: true }); const channels = await tenant.slack.db.channels.search({ data: {} });

steps.description: Retrieves the Linear team ID from environment configuration
